CheckTitle: DNSSEC is enabled to protect DNS responses from tampering
Description: Verifies that DNSSEC is enabled for Cloudflare zones to cryptographically sign DNS responses and protect against DNS spoofing and cache poisoning attacks.
Risk: Without DNSSEC, DNS responses can be spoofed or modified by attackers, enabling man-in-the-middle attacks, phishing through DNS hijacking, and redirection of users to malicious infrastructure.

Recommendation.Text: Enable DNSSEC and ensure DS records are properly configured at your domain registrar. DNSSEC provides cryptographic authenticity for DNS responses as a critical layer in domain security.
